data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A web database development library with record versioning, access
    control at the record level, and file attachments was needed for me.
    A some minimal general purpose CSCW environment provided as an
    example. Modular structure and some codes implemented due to
    infrastructural needs. CGI::Bus module provides based on CGI module
    core application object to load, contain and manage any other used
    by application objects, methods and data.
